text: Oxymeris caledonica is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Terebridae, the auger snails. ==Description== The shell size varies between 40 mm and 75 mm. ==Distribution== This species occurs along New Caledonia. ==References== * Bratcher T. & Cernohorsky W.O. (1987). Living terebras of the world. A monograph of the recent Terebridae of the world. American Malacologists, Melbourne, Florida & Burlington, Massachusetts. 240pp * Terryn Y. (2007). Terebridae: A Collectors Guide. Conchbooks & NaturalArt. 59pp + plates. ==External links== * Gastropods.com : Acus caledonicus;accessed : 31 March Category:Terebridae Category:Gastropods described in 1909
title: Oxymeris caledonica
